items.summary: Update the full blog post page to include extra spacing at the very end of the post content and add a final call-to-action line inviting readers interested in rug tufting to open the complete course link, using exactly this URL: https://kramis-teppich.coachy.net/lp/rug-making-tutorial/?aff=lishayK007

Replace the placeholder affiliate link used in the blog post's existing 'Explore the Complete Course' button with the provided URL: https://kramis-teppich.coachy.net/lp/rug-making-tutorial/?aff=lishayK007
